      • insertUser

        public java.lang.Boolean insertUser​(@NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.lang.String uuid,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.lang.String playerName,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.lang.String ipAddress,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.sql.Timestamp firstLogin,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.sql.Timestamp lastLogin,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.lang.Boolean isOnline)
        Insert a user into the database.
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID of the minecraft user
        playerName - Name of the minecraft player
        ipAddress - IP address of the minecraft player
        firstLogin - The first time they logged in (as a timestamp)
        lastLogin - The last time they logged in (as a timestamp)
        isOnline - Is the user online
        Returns:
        True if the user was created successfully

      • updateUser

        public java.lang.Boolean updateUser​(@NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.lang.String uuid,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.lang.String playerName,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.lang.String ipAddress,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.sql.Timestamp lastLogin,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.lang.Boolean isOnline,
                                    @NotNull
                                    @NotNull java.lang.Boolean isJoining)
        Update a user record
        Parameters:
        uuid - Users current UUID
        playerName - Users current player name
        ipAddress - Users current IP address
        lastLogin - The timestamp of the last time a user logged in
        isOnline - Is the user online
        isJoining - Will update the times connected if true, other wise false
        Returns:
        True if the update was successful.
